pages.text: $(li)The Cartography table is a block that allows you works with $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/map)Maps$(/l).

$(li)If this block is placed near a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a $(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Cartographer$(/l).$(br)$(li)To use it, first, you need to place it.$(br)$(li)Now right click on it to open a new GUI.$(br)$(li)This GUI will allow you to manipulate maps.

pages.title: Clone Maps
pages.text: $(li)In ther Carography Table you can clone maps.$(br)$(li)To do this, you have to insert an used Map and an Empty Map into the Cartography Table.$(br)$(li)Finally, extract the copy of the Map of the output slot and save it into your inventory.

pages.title: Upgrade Maps
pages.text: $(li)In the Cartography Table you can upgrade the size of the map too.$(br)$(li)To do this you have to insert an used Map and a Piece of paper into the Cartography Table.$(br)$(li)Finally, extract the upgraded map of the output slot and save it into your inventory.

pages.title: Lock Maps
pages.text: $(li)In the Cartography Table you can lock maps preventing to them being modified.$(br)$(li)To do this you have to insert an used Map and a $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/glass_panes)Glass Pane$(/l) into the Cartography Table.$(br)$(li)Finally, extract the locked map of the output slot and save it into your inventory.
